title: server unavailable after getting kicked from game?
body: Just in a game and I disc and my internet was still active and now it says NA unavailable and I can't log back on. Probably going to get a leave or loss for this. BS.

replies.body: The new patch was going through during the time of those post, so there may have been some downtime.  We let players know in advance, and recommend bookmarking our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for any incoming server happenings.  Everything should be in the clear now!

Edit: I think I misread your post and I was talking about a different problem, but see this

vvv

About 2 hours ago would have been when the patch happened, they are usually about this time every week.

Any active games should be finished as a 'dead game' (game just stops and everyone disconnects, no one wins or loses).
Ya im having the same problem. I get disconnected from server and when i try yo reconnect it says connect reconnect server unavailable. Please help.
